name: Lukas Celab
message: Sourcery seeks to inspire and educate the students giving them the opportunity to learn and apply technological product development skills.

name: Meri Navickė
message: I highly recommend Sourcery Academy for anyone looking to learn front-end development. The courses and lectures are top-notch and cover everything from the basics to advanced techniques. The use of React in the curriculum was particularly helpful for me as a beginner, as it allowed me to quickly understand and build complex pages and components. I went into the program with very little experience, but now I feel confident and capable in my abilities. A big thanks to the Sourcery team!

name: Cristina Nueva
message: I really enjoyed working with the team using agile principles.

name: Sara O’Neal
message: Sourcery for Developers improved my ASP.NET and React.js skills and taught me how to build a successful project working with a team.

name: Giuliano Sevele
message: Sourcery for Developers helped me to become a better JAVA developer.

name: Jon Moore
message: Sourcery for Testers seeks to inspire and educate the students giving them the opportunity to learn and apply technological product development skills.

name: Kuki Jong
message: During the 3 month academy we managed to learn not only the basics, but also to solve more serious issues. I am glad that I chose to apply and challenge myself. I would definitely recommend to apply for anyone who’s interested in testing.

name: Lucas Celab
message: I really enjoyed working with the team using agile principles.

name: Aidas Buivydas
message: Sourcery Academy's front-end courses are straight fire! And did you know the programmer's code look so clean? Because it had only the 'nice-to-have' comments.

name: Albertas Rinkevičius
message: I found the lectures very useful especially when developing an actual project alongside. Just after 3 months I’ve broadened my JS and Accessibility skills and shipped our product. I am glad that I’ve challenged myself by applying to SFE.

name: Aistė Gerdzevičiūtė
message: Sourcery Academy and was extremely impressed with the quality of the instruction and resources provided. The front-end development course was thorough and covered a wide range of topics, from the basics to advanced techniques.
